title: Bug Fixes
content:
• Updated homepage hero's font sizes
  • Fixed code leaks and insecurities in the new changelog system

title: Patch Notes - Website and Discord Bot Update
content:
This changelog talks about:

  • Discord bot improvements
  • The shift to Components v2 (1% there!)
  • Website upgrades


As you may have noticed, Strike's website is now more user friendly, both for desktop and mobile. Recently updated the mobile menu as well.


The Discord bot's development has slowed a bit as the holidays have come closer, but the bot should be done by June 2026 (Only a prediction). The bot now has:


  • A new /ping command
  • A new /redeem command for later implemented premium
  • Bug fixes to a few moderation commands
  • New section in the /settings command
  • Updated JSON handler file for more speedy performance


We are going to migrate to a database, most likely MongoDB, in early 2026 or spring.


That's it for today - Strike's coming along not too bad. See attached images below.ï»¿
